subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
Parking
Rain
Computers and the Internet
lead_paragraph: U.S.G.A. officials are considering whether to allow fans with Thursday tickets to attend another day of the U.S. Open because rain halted the event so early on the first day.
snippet: U.S.G.A. officials are considering whether to allow fans with Thursday tickets to attend another day of the U.S. Open because rain halted the event so early on the first day.
